# Executive Summary

This page demonstrates key Quarto/Markdown features requested for the assignment, including headings, two-column layout, lists, tables, math, images, video, a Mermaid diagram, a block quote, a footnote, and a citation (e.g., see @vaswani2017attention; also @athey2019machine).
